agg_by_direction_description: Aggregate by flow direction: In or Out
agg_by_domain_description: Aggregate by measurement's domain, for instance: heat, electricity
agg_by_measurement_description: Aggregate by measurement name, for instance: current_power, energy, inlet_temperature, air_temperature
compare_interval_type_description: Compare current period with period which happened in the past (date subtracted by chosen setting).
notification_visibility_description: Set demand requests list visibility in the main page content
panel_qr_code_description: Text which will be encoded into QR code graphics
panel_qr_code_position: QR code position on the visible site area
panel_qr_code_position_description: QR code position on the visible site area
panel_qr_code_size_description: Size of the QR code picture in pixels
relative_values_description: Present values as fraction of aggregated values grouped by the provided parameters
tile_legend_visibility_description: Toggle on/off the legend in the tile charts
